_comment: Risk management configuration for all trading strategies (Module 25: Multi-asset)

_documentation.default_risk_per_trade: Fraction of account to risk per trade (0.01 = 1%)
_documentation.max_exposure: Maximum total exposure as fraction of account (null = unlimited)
_documentation.min_position_size_usd: Minimum position size in USD to prevent dust trades
_documentation.enable_trailing_stop: Enable percentage-based trailing stop loss (false = disabled)
_documentation.trailing_stop_pct: Trailing stop distance as decimal (0.02 = 2% trail from highest price)
